brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buy_time = #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
car_detail = #{carDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
